summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4500 for the improvement of Thorndyke Avenue, from a connection with the existing sewer approximately 200 feet north of West Ray Street to West Hayes Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52462, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
